title: Braod Leaf 350 Iron Man McGinnity For Trade or Sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Braod Leaf 350 Iron Man McGinnity For Trade or Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: James Gallo
I picked this guy up recently and just got him back from SGC.  He is an SGC 30 and looks nice for the grade as several of the creases don't break color.



I am only willing to trade this for some very specific things as follows



Tougher Joe Jackson cards especially a Boston Store



1916 UNC cards (not the big Heads but the "strip" ones)



Boston Store HOFers.



I can add cash if needed for the right deal.



[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbcbroadleafmcginnity.jpg[/IMG]



In plastic Case



[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbcblmiginnity30.jpg[/IMG]





Please email me all offers to jgallony@aol.com.  Not looking for cash right now.  Thanks



James G

Looking for 1915 Cracker Jacks and 1909-11 American Caramel E90-1.
